video.title: Les Revenants
video.synopsis: On returning home and finding they're believed to be dead, a collection of near-strangers from the same village try to find a reason for their plight.

episodes.synopsis: Years after their deaths, dearly departed residents of a small mountain town mysteriously reappear, throwing their loved ones' lives into turmoil.
episodes.title: Camille

episodes.synopsis: Adele attempts to come to terms with Simon's "return" as things get emotionally complicated. Camille tries to restart her old life.
episodes.title: Simon

episodes.synopsis: Camille invents a new identity, and Lena is horrified by a mysterious affliction. Meanwhile, an old trauma resurfaces for Julie.
episodes.title: Julie

episodes.synopsis: Lena's health takes a turn for the worse. Meanwhile, Adele and Simon begin to rekindle their romance, and Julie ponders what to do with Victor.
episodes.title: Victor

episodes.synopsis: Both Camille and Simon find themselves abruptly rejected, and Victor embarks on a search for his murderer.
episodes.title: Serge and Toni

episodes.synopsis: While Camille and Lucy find new roles within the community, Julie seeks refuge with an old friend, and Lena grows closer to her mysterious rescuer.
episodes.title: Lucy

episodes.synopsis: Camille is accused of hurting people around her. Meanwhile, Simon investigates the circumstances of his death, and Julie wants to leave town.
episodes.title: Adele

episodes.synopsis: Tensions are high between the living and the dead as a newer, creepier wave of "the returned" descends upon them.
episodes.title: The Horde
